General.Name: ConnectM Technology Solutions, Inc.
General.Description: ConnectM Technology Solutions, Inc., a clean technology company, provides a digital platform for the electrification and decarbonization needs of homeowners in the United States and India. It operates through Electrification, Decarbonization, OEM/EV, and Managed Services segments. The company offers residential and light commercial buildings, and all-electric original equipment manufacturers with a digital platform to accelerate the transition to solar and all-electric heating, cooling, and transportation. It also operates Aurai, an electrification and decarbonization application for residential and light commercial buildings; and Yantra, a transportation and logistics network application that enables EV OEMs to offer smart features to their end customers. In addition, the company offers installation, update, and repair services for heating and air-conditioning products; products for the monitoring of energy utilization and energy resources; solar-related roof installation, inspection, and repair services for solar energy system integration and maintenance programs; electrical contracting; residential and commercial pool heating, domestic and commercial hot water systems, photovoltaic power systems, battery back-up power systems, and solar powered attic ventilation systems; roofing services; and managed services, as well as sells HVAC equipment and solar panels. It serves service providers and end customers. ConnectM Technology Solutions, Inc. was founded in 2007 and is headquartered in Marlborough, Massachusetts.
General.Address: 2 Mount Royal Avenue, Marlborough, MA, United States, 01752
